info.description: These RESTFUL endpoints are to retrieve Awards data service detail information
info.title: Awards Data Service API

parameters.name: lastModifiedDate
parameters.description: Last modified date Range (max of 5 yrs range). Format: MM/dd/yyyy

parameters.name: referenceIdvPiid
parameters.description: Referenced IDV PIID. This is required field. If no value passed, default value is EMPTY string

parameters.name: dateSigned
parameters.description: Date Signed Range (Max of 5 years Range). Format: MM/dd/yyyy

parameters.name: reasonForModification
parameters.description: A valid one character Code for Reason Modification

parameters.name: reasonForModificationDesc
parameters.description: The complete value of Reason For Modification Description

parameters.name: referenceModificationNumber
parameters.description: A valid complete value of Reference Modification Number

parameters.name: oldAgencyCode
parameters.description: A valid four character other AgencyID

parameters.name: oldPiid
parameters.description: A valid complete value of other PIID

parameters.name: oldModificationNumber
parameters.description: A valid complete value of other Modification Number

parameters.name: oldTransactionNumber
parameters.description: A valid complete value of other Transaction Number

parameters.name: oldIdvAgencyCode
parameters.description: A valid four character Other RferencedIDV AgencyID

parameters.name: oldIdvPiid
parameters.description: A valid complete value other ReferencedIDV PIID

parameters.name: oldIdvModificationNumber
parameters.description: A valid complete value other ReferencedIDV Modification Number

parameters.name: feePaidForUseOfService
parameters.description: Fee Paid For Use Of IDV

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: A Valid Four Character Value Of DepartmentId

parameters.name: fundingAgencyCode
parameters.description: A Valid Four Character Value Of Funding Agency ID

parameters.name: fundingOfficeCode
parameters.description: A Valid Value Of Funding Office ID

parameters.name: typeOfFeeForUseOfService
parameters.description: Type Of Fee For Use Of Service

parameters.name: mainAccountCode
parameters.description: Treasury Account Symbol Agency Main Account

parameters.name: subAccountCode
parameters.description: Treasury Account Symbol Agency Sub Account

parameters.name: ngcParticipation
parameters.description: Non Traditional Government Contractor Participation Code

parameters.name: ngcParticipationDesc
parameters.description: Non Traditional Government Contractor Participation Description

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Country of Product or Service Origin Code

parameters.name: awardCountryName
parameters.description: Country of Product or Service Origin Description
